body:
The game is simple, say "When I get mod, I will..." then say what you would do.
For example: When I get mod, I will moderate Avicus" (simple enough)

Please don't discourage other peoples decisions.

Have Fun!! :)
body_tagged:
The game is simple, say "When I get mod, I will..." then say what you would do.
For example: When I get mod, I will moderate Avicus" (simple enough)

Please don't discourage other peoples decisions.

Have Fun!! :)

replies.body:
When i get mod , i will be enthusiastic the first couple of months, then I'll take the rank for granted, but still try to do my best. And after a year or so, I will copy all staff documents, then grief the originals, publish the copied docs. Sell all staff intern stuff to people that have bad intentions.

I mean: I will be a good mod and don't harm the server.
